attributes.title: DUMP TRUMP
attributes.review: Trump is an uneducated racist sexual predator. He has cost this country hundreds of millions of dollars. He also supports corrupt police and racist politicians who want to put the colored community to be in a worse position than they already are. Trump is a disgrace to humanity and needs to be locked up.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i could see what racist sexist homophobic misogynistic idiotic things the cheeto man had on his agenda. immediately after downloading the app it asked for my phone number which made me very suspicious right away because i do not give my number to strangers. 5 minutes after downloading it i noticed that the app was interfering with my tv signal!!! i was just trying to see spencer reid on criminal minds and the app made my screen go black and static appeared. my tea kettle started whistling, my microwave mysteriously started to walk away, and i know for a fact that my refrigerator said hello to me. my dog has also been acting strangely lately and my pet goldfish walked out of his bowl. this app personally called me dog ugly to his face which deeply offended him. so i tried to delete the app because it was a threat to my household belongings, but then it spammed my phone screen with a montage of several dancing oompa loompas. i finally managed to delete the app but then the very same oompa loompas managed to find my number and texted me begging me to re download it and rate it 5 stars to which i responded absolutely not❤️

attributes.title: Some...technical difficulties
attributes.review: This app called me the f-slur and told me to go back to Mexico. I was born in Oklahoma.

attributes.title: Horrible👋👋👋👋👋👋😑😑😑😑
attributes.review: Just get rid of it. If tik tok goes so does this app😂

attributes.title: Poo
attributes.review: When I opened the app it proceeded to grab me by the pus*y and then call me a stupid gypsy. I was so shook that I just went on the toilet and pooped. Bad app

attributes.title: Garbage app

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded the app because I just wanted to see what our good ole president lump was up to😇, and when i opened it, it started playing this provocative song🤢... i don’t know what it’s called 🤨but it went something like “foreigner 🎶 foreigner 🎶foreigner 🎶” and for a moment i enjoyed it😚 and i wanted to go to my spotify 🤪to check it out, but it locked me into the app😞!!!!! now i am i’m an endless loop of “🎶foreigner 🎶 foreigner 🎶foreigner 🎶” and i am so UPSET. i will admit it is one catchy tune, but now it will be playing forever and i’m so sad. 😔 please help me escape this 🎶foreigner🎶 prison that is this trump app😩

attributes.title: GARBO!!!
attributes.review: NOT GEN Z PRANK! this app is absolute garbo. i'm a graphic/communication designer-- meaning my whole job is to make aesthetically pleasing, user friendly, not-terrible apps. but this app makes me want to puke looking at it. the design and colors are so ugly it looks like it was made to mimic a website from the 90's. probably because old gross people are the only ones to use this and they're stuck in the past. it must remind them of when y'all could get away with being homophobic, racist, misogynistic butt munches. 🥰 anyways maybe if y'all added some games or something it would be better. boring!!

attributes.title: delete                                                             no❤️
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it did it just kept in glitching and made my phone keep glitching . don’t download the app HORRIBLE
